title: Audioslave Unreleased (Give, Golden Visions, We Got The Whip)
description:
Mp3 format. 3 unreleased tracks from the original recording session of the Chris Cornell and Tom Morello, Brad Wilk and Tim Commerford (formerly of Rage Against the Machine). At the time these tracks were recorded the fledgling band was tentatively named "Civilian;" the band would officially release their music under the name "Audioslave," and these three tracks were dropped from the self-titled first release in 2002. I have been hording these in my personal archive for 6 years, and now that the band members have gone their separate ways, I&#039;m releasing them for the first time.

Track 15 "Give" is a bad recording, but a good song, and a must have for any true fand and collector.

Tracks 16 and 17 "Golden Visions" and "We Got the Whip" are great recordings of what are probably the best songs to come out of that first recording session from the group.

P.S.

Be on the lookout for Chris Cornell&#039;s upcoming solo album co-written and produced by Timbaland.
You can hear just a brief portion of 2 of the new songs in the new VCast commercial from Verizon Wireless.
